Html: Hi, I would like to ask how to chunk specific part of the song? Let's say I have 2 minutes length song and I want my program to chunk 30 seconds each into 4 parts so that user can click and play the selected 30 seconds. Any library of Naudio can provide the function of chunk the song or wavestream? Thanks a lot.
OffsetSampleProvider is for this very purpose. Read my blog post about it here.
